QuestionList.Answer: All evolutions: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Leafeon, Umbreon, Sylveon, Espeon, Glaceon

QuestionList.QuestionTxt: Name all possible Burmy evolution and the conditions to get them
QuestionList.Answer:
Male Burmy -> Mothim 
Female Burmy evolves into Wormadam with 3 different cloaks 
Plant Cloak: Last battle in the overworld
Sandy Cloak: Last Battle was in cave or a beach
Trash Cloak: Last battle was in building

QuestionCategories.Category: Name the game from a bad description

QuestionList.QuestionTxt: Pink puffball fight a greedy hammer-wielding penguin by eating his enemies and absorbing their powers. He tends to make things worse by accident.
Nerd with thick glasses tries to solve his problems with a crowbar
A redneck and a snarky girl team up to crush an old woman under a boulder and do jigsaw puzzles. Redneck's sister narrowly escapes transformation into an ogre.
Pirates try to conquer the universe using jellyfish, and the only one who can stop them is an orphaned girl raised by birds.
A strapping young man dresses in leather and enters an old family acquaintance's dungeon to whip him mercilessly.

QuestionCategories.Category: Name the game from a bad description

QuestionList.QuestionTxt: A group of people are at the complete mercy of a whimsical and cruel god who alternates between deleting their toilets and trapping them inside the very walls of their own homes.
A boy in a green skirt and tights collects the hearts of his slain enemies, engages in arson, pesters the elderly and blows up endangered dinosaurs.
A small blue mammal steals batteries from a fat man.
Cops break into a house and kill everyone inside.
Guy named after a penis builds a fortress named after a clitoris and is defeated by a guy named after an erection.

QuestionCategories.Category: Name the anime from a bad description

QuestionList.QuestionTxt: It's totally normal for ninjas to wear brightly colored clothing.
Children put their companions in balls and sometimes take them out and make them fight.
A dangerous octopus is appeased with a teaching position.
An alien makes a high school boy do crazy thing with his hand.
A teddy bear makes hight school students kill each other

QuestionCategories.Category: Name the movie from a bad description

QuestionList.QuestionTxt: An elderly man uses balloons to kidnap a small boy.
A man's sense of reality alters after taking a pill.
A young boy and an old man go to extraordinary lengths to make the boy's parents have sex.
A grown man plays with a toy and sleeps for almost the entire movie.
70 years old mass murderer is obssessed with a boy and will do anything to get close to him.
QuestionList.Answer: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
